To use this functionality you *must* add your games Bundle ID from Apple, to the [*Game Admin > Settings*](/platforms/apple/authentication/) page of your games profile on mod.io. A Successful request will return an [Access Token Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/access-token-object)."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Apple"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/external/appleauth"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Request an access token on behalf of a 'Sign in with Apple' user. To use this functionality you *must* add your games Bundle ID from Apple, to the [*Game Admin > Settings*](/platforms/apple/authentication/) page of your games profile on mod.io. A Successful request will return an [Access Token Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/access-token-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Apple Authentication Request","required":["id_token"],"properties":{"id_token":{"description":"The ID token returned to your iOS application upon using Sign in with Apple functionality.","type":"string","example":"eyJhbXciOiJIUzI1Lizs...."},"terms_agreed":{"description":"This MUST be set to `false` unless you have collected the [users agreement](/restapi/docs/terms) prior to calling this endpoint in which case it can be set to `true` and will be recorded.<br /><br />__NOTE:__ If this is set to `false` and the user has not agreed to the latest mod.io Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, an error `403 Forbidden (error_ref 11074)` will be returned and you will need to collect the [users agreement](/restapi/docs/terms) and retry with this value set to `true` to authenticate the user.","type":"boolean","example":true},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date in which the returned token will expire. Value cannot be higher than the default value which is a week (unix timestamp + 604800 seconds). Using a token after it's expiry time has elapsed will result in a `401 Unauthorized` response.","type":"integer","example":1729236480}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Access Token Object","description":"Contains user access token.","properties":{"code":{"description":"HTTP Response Code.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":200},"access_token":{"description":"The user's access token.","type":"string","example":"eyJ0eXAiOiXKV1QibCJhbLciOiJeiUzI1....."},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the date this token will expire. Default is one year from issue date. See [Access Token Lifetime & Expiry](/restapi/docs/making-requests).","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1570673249}},"type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"The game associated with the supplied api_key is currently not available.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/docs/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"11032":"mod.io was unable to verify the credentials against the external service provider.","11201":"The Apple token supplied in the request is invalid.","11202":"The Apple token supplied has expired.","14001":"The game associated with the supplied api_key is currently not available."}},"403":{"description":"The api_key supplied in the request must be associated with a game.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/docs/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"11016":"The api_key supplied in the request must be associated with a game.","11017":"The api_key supplied in the request is for test environment purposes only and cannot be used for this functionality.","11074":"The user has not agreed to the mod.io Terms of Use. Please see terms_agreed parameter description and the [Terms](/restapi/docs/terms) endpoint for more information.","11203":"The Apple Bundle ID associated with this game has not been configured.","11205":"The Apple Bundle ID associated with this game is invalid."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
